Keywords: Excalibur , Mystical , Ruler
Real Name: Opal Luna Saturnyne
Special Powers
STACKING THE DECK: During force construction, you may add 5 Tarot Cards to your Sideline. These do not count towards your Sideline limit. // During game setup, you may swap up to 5 Tarot Cards from your Tarot Card deck with the Tarot Cards on your Sideline (your Tarot Card deck must still meet the deck building requirements).
OUR NEXT CONTEST: Telekinesis. When Saturnyne use it to place a character adjacent to an opposing character, after resolutions remove an action token from the placed character.
PUTTING MY THUMB ON THE SCALE: Once per turn, you may increase or decrease an attack total by 1.

Comments
December 3, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
The overall effectiveness and efficiency of this piece is quite impressive to say the least; if you think about the ability to quasi utilize a perplex on either your or your opponent's turn is very strong. As long as there's fodder to mastermind to she will stay alive. Mastermind and power cosmic is a brutal combination. Ran this piece earlier in the week; was very impressed with how many times I forced my opponent to re-roll an attack and then only to miss; as each game wore on it continued to frustrate and astound my opponents as they were unable to hit my characters time and time again. A wonderful budget choice for those who do not wish to shell out money for Mad Jim prime.

September 4, 2022
Coyote's Own
Attack total is the sum of Attack Stat and Dice Roll calculated in step 2 of the attack sequence. So if you had three Saturnyne you could lower three attack totals by 1, one by 2 and one by 1, or one by three.
